description:
Shows statistics and health details of selected DBaaS instance on selected cloud: 
 - health status of each adapter and DBaaS aggregator 
 - load factor—number of requests to DBaaS 
 - number of data bases that are and are not registered in DBaaS. If DB wasn’t created by DBaaS but was created directly 
 - it can cause problems for backup and maintenance procedures, so it is important to keep tracking such cases 
 - JVM parameters for each DBaaS adapter and aggregator.

targets.query: select max(value) from "ma.status"  WHERE namespace =~ /^$dbaas_namespace$/ AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' and $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0)
select last(uptime) from "ma.pod_info"  WHERE namespace =~ /^$dbaas_namespace$/ AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator'
select last("value") from "ma.jvm_threads_live_threads"  WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name" = 'dbaas-aggregator'
select last("value") from "ma.jvm_classes_loaded_classes"  WHERE namespace =~ /^$dbaas_namespace$/ AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator'
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu/usage_rate" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "name" = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), pod_name fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu/limit" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "name" = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), pod_name fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu/request" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "name" = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), pod_name fill(null)

panels.description: The amount of used memory (Stack value)

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory/limit" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND container_name= 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory/usage" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND container_name= 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory/usage" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND container_name= 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_memory_used_bytes" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND area = 'heap' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_memory_used_bytes" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND area = 'nonheap' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Commited Memory

panels.description: The open file descriptor count (average for current time interval)

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.process_files_open_files" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name= 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Open Files

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.dbaas.registration.databases.ghost.number" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name"='dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.dbaas.registration.databases.total.number"  WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name"='dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.dbaas.registration.databases.ghost.number" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name"='dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.dbaas.registration.databases.total.number" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name"='dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.dbaas.registration.databases.lost.number" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name"='dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.dbaas.adapter.health" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name"='dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), type, identifier fill(null)

targets.expr: avg(dbaas_adapter_database_operation_request_total{type="$adapter", container="$service_name", namespace="$namespace"} - dbaas_adapter_database_operation_request_total{type="$adapter", container="$service_name", namespace="$namespace"} offset $__interval) by (operation, result) OR on() vector(0)
targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.dbaas_adapter_database_operation_request_total" WHERE "type"='$adapter' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), operation, result fill(null)

panels.title: Number of requests to adapter $adapter by operation

targets.expr: avg(increase(dbaas_adapter_database_operation_seconds_sum{type="$adapter", container="$service_name", namespace="$namespace"}[$inter])/increase(dbaas_adapter_database_operation_seconds_count{type="$adapter", container="$service_name", namespace="$namespace"}[$inter]) OR on() vector(0)) by (operation)
targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value")) FROM "ma.dbaas_adapter_database_operation_seconds_sum" WHERE "type"='$adapter' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), operation fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.dbaas.registration.databases.postgresql.total.number" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name"='dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.dbaas.registration.databases.mongodb.total.number" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name"='dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.dbaas.registration.databases.cassandra.total.number" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name"='dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.dbaas.registration.databases.elasticsearch.total.number" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name"='dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.dbaas.registration.databases.redis.total.number" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name"='dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Number of registered databases per adapter type

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.dbaas.registration.databases.mongodb.total.number" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name"='dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.dbaas.registration.databases.redis.total.number" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name"='dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Number of not registered databases per adapter type

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.dbaas.registration.databases.postgresql.total.number" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name"='dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.dbaas.registration.databases.mongodb.total.number" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name"='dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.dbaas.registration.databases.cassandra.total.number" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name"='dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.dbaas.registration.databases.redis.total.number" WHERE "namespace" ='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name"='dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Number of lost databases per adapter type

panels.description: The amount of used memory in heap area multiplied by different ids

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_memory_used_bytes" WHERE namespace =~ /^$dbaas_namespace$/ AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND area = 'heap' AND "id"='$jvm_heap_part' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_memory_max_bytes" WHERE namespace =~ /^$dbaas_namespace$/ AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND area = 'heap' AND "id"='$jvm_heap_part' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_memory_committed_bytes" WHERE namespace =~ /^$dbaas_namespace$/ AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND area = 'heap' AND "id"='$jvm_heap_part' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Heap Usage: $jvm_heap_part

panels.description: The amount of used memory in heap area multiplied by different ids

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_memory_used_bytes" WHERE namespace =~ /^$dbaas_namespace$/ AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND area = 'heap' AND "id"='$jvm_heap_part' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_memory_max_bytes" WHERE namespace =~ /^$dbaas_namespace$/ AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND area = 'heap' AND "id"='$jvm_heap_part' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_memory_committed_bytes" WHERE namespace =~ /^$dbaas_namespace$/ AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND area = 'heap' AND "id"='$jvm_heap_part' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Heap Usage: $jvm_heap_part

panels.description: The amount of used memory in heap area multiplied by different ids

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_memory_used_bytes" WHERE namespace =~ /^$dbaas_namespace$/ AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND area = 'heap' AND "id"='$jvm_heap_part' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_memory_max_bytes" WHERE namespace =~ /^$dbaas_namespace$/ AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND area = 'heap' AND "id"='$jvm_heap_part' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_memory_committed_bytes" WHERE namespace =~ /^$dbaas_namespace$/ AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND area = 'heap' AND "id"='$jvm_heap_part' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Heap Usage: $jvm_heap_part

panels.description: The amount of used memory in non heap area multiplied by different ids

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_memory_used_bytes" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND area = 'nonheap' AND "id"='$jvm_nonheap_part'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_memory_max_bytes" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND area = 'nonheap'  AND "id"='$jvm_nonheap_part' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_memory_committed_bytes" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND area = 'nonheap'  AND "id"='$jvm_nonheap_part' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Non Heap: $jvm_nonheap_part

panels.description: The amount of used memory in non heap area multiplied by different ids

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_memory_used_bytes" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND area = 'nonheap' AND "id"='$jvm_nonheap_part'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_memory_max_bytes" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND area = 'nonheap'  AND "id"='$jvm_nonheap_part' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Non Heap: $jvm_nonheap_part

panels.description: An estimate of the total capacity of the buffers in this pool (Off-heap buffers from allocateDirect())

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_buffer_memory_used_bytes" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND "id"='$jvm_buffers_type' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_buffer_total_capacity_bytes" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND "id"='$jvm_buffers_type'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Byte buffers: $jvm_buffers_type

panels.description: An estimate of the total capacity of the buffers in this pool (Off-heap buffers from allocateDirect())

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_buffer_memory_used_bytes" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND "id"='$jvm_buffers_type' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_buffer_total_capacity_bytes" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND "id"='$jvm_buffers_type'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Byte buffers: $jvm_buffers_type

panels.description: Time spent for minor and major GC per second

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "ma.jvm_gc_pause_seconds_sum" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), cause, action fill(null)

panels.title: GC: Pauses

panels.description: Increase in the size of the young generation memory pool after one GC to before the next

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value")) FROM "ma.jvm_gc_memory_allocated_bytes_total" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), cause, action fill(null)

panels.title: GC: Allocations

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_threads_live_threads" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_threads_daemon_threads" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_threads_peak_threads" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jvm_threads_states_threads" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), state fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "ma.jdbc_connections_active" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.jdbc_connections_max" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.hikaricp_connections_active" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.hikaricp_connections_idle" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.hikaricp_connections_max" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ma.hikaricp_connections_pending" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value")) FROM "ma.hikaricp_connections_usage_seconds_sum" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value")) FROM "ma.hikaricp_connections_usage_seconds_count" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value")) FROM "ma.logback_events_total" WHERE "namespace"='$dbaas_namespace' AND "service_name"='dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), level fill(null)

SELECT  non_negative_derivative(mean(value), 1s) FROM "ma.http_server_requests_seconds_count" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator'  AND status =~ /^2.+/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), uri fill(null)

panels.description: Shows maximum time of requests execution to service endpoints

targets.query:
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(value)) from "ma.http_server_requests_seconds_max"  WHERE service_name='dbaas-aggregator' AND "namespace"='$dbaas_namespace' AND status=~/^2.+/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), uri
 fill(null)

panels.title: HTTP Endpoint Timings. Code 2xx

panels.description: Shows amount of requests to different URLs per second with code 4xx

targets.expr: avg(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{container="$service_name", namespace="$namespace", status=~"4.."}[$inter])) by (uri) OR on() vector(0)
targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "ma.http_server_requests_seconds_count" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND status=~/^4.+/ AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY uri, time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: HTTP Endpoint Statistics. Code: 4xx

panels.description: Shows amount of requests to different URLs per second with code 5xx

targets.expr: avg(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{container="$service_name", namespace="$namespace", status=~"5.."}[$inter])) by (uri) OR on() vector(0)
targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "ma.http_server_requests_seconds_count" WHERE namespace ='$dbaas_namespace' AND status=~/^5.+/ AND service_name = 'dbaas-aggregator' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY uri, time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: HTTP Endpoint Statistics. Code: 5xx

current.text: Eden Space + Survivor Space + Tenured Gen

title: DBAAS Dashboard (Spring Boot 2 Services)
